System.M_MENUEXE001: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUEXE_CODE, M.MENUEXE_NAME, M.MENUEXE_HELP, M.FUN_TYPE, M.CLASS_NAME, M.PATH_NAME, M.MENUEXE_SEQ FROM M_MENUEXE AS M TAG_WHERE
System.M_MENUEXE002: SELECT M.USERID, M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUEXE_CODE, M.MENUEXE_NAME, M.MENUEXE_HELP, M.FUN_TYPE, M.CLASS_NAME, M.PATH_NAME, M.MENUEXE_SEQ FROM M_MYMENU_U AS M TAG_WHERE
System.M_MENUEXE003: SELECT M.USERGID, M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUEXE_CODE, M.MENUEXE_NAME, M.MENUEXE_HELP, M.FUN_TYPE, M.CLASS_NAME, M.PATH_NAME, M.MENUEXE_SEQ FROM M_MYMENU_G AS M TAG_WHERE
System.M_MENUEXE004: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUEXE_CODE, M.MENUEXE_NAME, M.MENUEXE_HELP, M.FUN_TYPE, M.CLASS_NAME, M.PATH_NAME, M.MENUEXE_SEQ , COALESCE(ME2.CONTROL_TYPE, 0) AS CONTROL_TYPE FROM M_MENUEXE AS M LEFT JOIN M_EXECTL2 AS ME2 ON M.MENUGRP_CODE = ME2.MENUGRP_CODE AND M.MENUEXE_CODE = ME2.MENUEXE_CODE AND ME2.USERID = ? TAG_WHERE ORDER BY M.MENUEXE_CODE
System.M_MENUEXE005: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUEXE_CODE, M.MENUEXE_NAME, M.MENUEXE_HELP, M.FUN_TYPE, M.CLASS_NAME, M.PATH_NAME, M.MENUEXE_SEQ FROM M_MENUEXE AS M WHERE M.PATH_NAME LIKE ? FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
